name: Micro Point Therapy
description: A therapeutic approach using micro-needling and targeted pressure points to alleviate pain and enhance healing.

name: Acupressure Point Therapy
description: A method of applying pressure to specific points on the body to balance energy flow and relieve tension.

name: Auricular Therapy
description: Therapy that focuses on the ear points to treat physical and emotional issues through stimulation.

name: Colour Therapy
description: A form of therapy that uses colors to enhance physical and emotional well-being.

name: Seeds Therapy
description: Utilizing the healing properties of seeds applied at specific pressure points to balance energy and relieve ailments.

name: Jingle Therapy
description: A unique therapy that combines sound therapy and pressure point stimulation to relax the body and mind.

name: Sound Healing Therapy
description: Using vibrational sound frequencies to promote healing and relaxation, this therapy targets stress relief and emotional healing.

name: Reiki Therapy
description: A form of energy healing that involves the therapist transferring universal energy to the client to promote healing and balance.

name: Deep Meditation
description: A profound form of meditation aimed at achieving a deep state of mental clarity, relaxation, and spiritual insight.

name: Meditation Therapy (Basic)
description: A beginner-friendly meditation session to help clients relax, relieve stress, and improve mental focus.

name: Water Meditation
description: A therapy combining the calming effects of water and guided meditation to promote relaxation and clarity of mind.
